entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:53 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
